document_data.mainbody:
he River Reddan was a river in the Dragon Coast region of the Eastern Heartlands.
The river ran east by northeast from the Lake of the Snake towards the Redwater.While the Lake of the Snake is not labeled on the map from Dragon magazine 365, its relation to the Giants Run Mountains on the map from the Vilhon Reach sourcebook, clearly indicates its location in relation tot he River Reddan.
* Smugglers Bank
